short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that helps you fact-check, debate, and identify bias in news articles utilizing the latest Gemini LLM models.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the power of Gemini with Lexal! This free Chrome extension is your ultimate tool for critical thinking and efficient browsing. With just a right-click, you can:

- Fact Check: Instantly verify the truth behind any statement.
- Bias Check: Detect and analyse biases in articles with precision.
- Summarise/TLDR: Get concise summaries of lengthy content for quick understanding.
- LLM Driven Debates: Initiate dynamic debates, arguing both for and against any topic, showcasing well-reasoned, concise points.

All these features support outputs in your browser's language, making it seamless and user-friendly. 

Use your own Gemini developer key https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api?gad_source=1&gclid=CjwKCAjwkJm0BhBxEiwAwT1AXBvVeLEtG2jU3FQ7mj61j6P4PyM4vkFL5PB_q3_plitt8XkauG0rqBoC1y8QAvD_BwE and don't worry about a third party using your data. This app is completely standalone and admits it's a wrapper for an LLM without charging you for tokens etc... take advantage of the free Gemini credit allowances https://cloud.google.com/ai/llms?hl=en
